subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: Reggie Jackson said he was a significant part of the 1977 season for the Yankees but was not consulted about the script of the ESPN miniseries “The Bronx is Burning.”
snippet: Reggie Jackson said he was a significant part of the 1977 season for the Yankees but was not consulted about the script of the ESPN miniseries “The Bronx is Burning.”
